title: league of legends player my names osama
body: i have ban bec i have bad con and its urf game haw can i get banned from urf game

replies.body: Please use Google Translate from your language. I wish to better understand what the problem is.

If it was for verbal, provide chat logs.

If it was for gameplay, provide which game it was.
Uhh did you think the rules dont apply to urf? Stop breaking the rules in ANY game mode, and your next account will never get punished. Good luck.

reading the comments this guy is so confused about what he wrote, he talsk to himself.

but seriously i dont get what you want... you are banned from urf? you dont get banned from a single gamemode.

you talk about "bad con" which i guess means bad connection so you got a low priority q? thats not a bad thats just a wait timer to tell you to not afk

also if you wanna answer someone click on reply
Disrespectful much? Did you ever stop and think that mabye english is not his first language?
please bro can you help me ? do you have social to Communication with you ?
i have ban from urf game wtf
haw can i delete this ban ?

There are two things you can do:
1. Send a ticket to the support 
2. Hack into riots system, search your entry in the database and put “permaban = 0”
